remarks: Property of a lattice element under a co-atom.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Feb-2014.)
statement:
lhple.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhple.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhple.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhple.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhple.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhple.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhple $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ X ) ./\ W ) = X ) $.
